# a traditional [[French]] dish consisting of [[pepper]]s (the vegetable) and various herbs and spices, or other vegetables
types.html:
poivronnade f (plural poivronnades)

  1. a traditional French dish consisting of peppers (the vegetable) and various herbs and spices, or other vegetables
trans: a traditional French dish consisting of peppers  and various herbs and spices, or other vegetables
